Rainy_Day_0: @, you woke up! The rain got me awake a bit earlier than usual.$h
Rainy_Day_1: Good morning! Don't let the weather drag you down! I got you breakfast!$h#$b#Enjoy![201]$h
Rainy_Day_2: I learned to like rain. I lean back and close my eyes, and try to stay in peace...$h
Rainy_Day_3: Hello, dear. Ready for a new day? Stay dry so you won't get cold.$h
Rainy_Day_4: Oh, I don't feel good today. I should make a hot cup of tea. Should I get yours too?#$e#I got you tea![614]$h
patio_Aurelia: Our farm looks so wonderful. It's very nice to look over the farm from here.$h
Rainy_Night_0: @! You are all wet! Come here, warm yourself up.
Rainy_Night_1: How was your day? Here, grab yourself some dinner.#$b#Do you like it? [202 206 231 607 649]$h
Rainy_Night_2: Aren't you cold, dear? Your lips are blue.$s#$b#Here, let me warm you up.$l
Rainy_Night_3: I read for hours today. It was a perfect day for a book.$h
Rainy_Night_4: @! You are finally home! I was worried about you.
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, @.#$b#I love our house. It is neat.$h
Indoor_Day_1: Did you sleep well, @? I got you breakfast.$h#$b#Here you go.[228 241 240 242]$h
Indoor_Day_2: How are you feeling today? Let me know if you ever feel sick. I will get you a nice cup of tea.$h
Indoor_Day_3: Going out to work? Don't forget that you are loved! Take care!$h
Indoor_Day_4: I am proud of you, @. Thank you for all you do.$h
Indoor_Night_0: How was work today? Are you feeling okay?$h
Indoor_Night_1: @, you are here! I got you dinner!$h#$b#Enjoy![202 206 231 607 649]$h
Indoor_Night_2: You came a bit later than I thought. Is everything going well?$h
Indoor_Night_3: @, I missed you today... Glad to see you.$l
Indoor_Night_4: Oh, dear. You look really tired. Is everything alright? Nothing to help?
Outdoor_0: What a beautiful day! I am so happy.$h
Outdoor_1: You have worked really hard for this farm. I am thankful.$h
Outdoor_2: I never knew I would actually get married... It's lovely.$l
Outdoor_3: The sky is so blue today, don't you think?$h
Outdoor_4: Oh dear, I feel amazing today. The sun is shining so bright.$h
OneKid_0: I can't believe I am a mother...! I want to be the best mom that I can be.$h
OneKid_1: Oh, my. I am a mother. I am so excited for our journey in parenthood!$h
OneKid_3: Can you believe that I am a mother? I would have never imagined.$h
TwoKids_2: I am so thankful for our kids. They are perfect little people.$h
TwoKids_3: I am going to let our kids know how much they are loved every day.$h
Good_2: What a wonderful day! Love you.$l
Good_4: I hope you know how much I care for you and love you.$h
Good_5: The moment I saw you, I knew my life was going to change for the better.$l
Good_6: Thank you for helping me to find my true self.$h
Good_7: Hey, love. Always remember I am here for you!$h
Good_8: Oh my. My life cannot be any better than it is.$l
Good_9: You are my one and only. I love you.$l
Neutral_1: I read a good book today. Do you wnat to hear about it?
Neutral_2: How are you doing today? I had a great day!$h
Neutral_4: Hmm, I think I need a massage... please?
Neutral_5: I am always thankful for everything you do.$h
Neutral_7: You look a bit tired these days. Everything alright?
Neutral_8: Oh, today was not a great day... I feel a bit sick.$s
Neutral_9: Hello, @. I tidied up the house today.
Bad_0: @. Are you busy these days? You seem distracted.
Bad_1: Wow. You finally acknowledged me. What do you want?
Bad_2: @, please tell me if there is a problem. Don't just stay distant from me.$a
Bad_3: Avoiding the problem won't help. I learned that the hard way.$a
Bad_4: Why are you acting so weird these days?$a
Bad_5: Hey, tell me what's up. It has been really difficult to understand you these days.
Bad_7: @, I think we need to talk. You have been... distant.
Bad_8: Do you have a problem with me? Did I do something wrong?
Bad_9: I... feel so useless to you.$s
funLeave_Aurelia: I will be around town today.$h
funReturn_Aurelia: It's always nice to  walk around town and see how everyone is doing.$h
spring_1: Another new year has begun! How wonderful!$h
spring_12: Tomorrow is the Egg Festival! I will cheer for you!$h
spring_23: Are you ready to dance tomorrow?$l
summer_10: Luau is tomorrow! Do you know what we are going to bring?$h
summer_27: Tomorrow is the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies! Let's go and watch it together.$l
fall_1: Ooh, it's fall! I am excited!
fall_15: Isn't it the Fair tomorrow? Good luck!$h
fall_26: Oh right. Tomorrow is Spirit's Eve... Will you hold my hand for the maze?
winter_1: Winter time! Stay warm so you don't get cold.$h
winter_7: Are you going to participate in the ice festival tomorrow?
winter_25: Happy Winter Star! Thank you for being with me this year!$l
winter_28: The year is almost over...! I am very grateful for you.$l
